project.title: NCR Interactive Teller: What is it?
project.description:
The overall aim of this course is simply to enable you to answer the question: What is NCR Interactive Teller?
Agenda items: An explanation of Interactive Teller and its significance in banking. List the transactions and capabilities offered by Interactive Teller. An overview of the system, showing the major components. A deeper dive on those components, defining what each component does. Basic hardware and software requirements of the system.
This course is intended for customers who must learn NCR Interactive Teller so they can effectively support their Interactive Teller Program internally.
